question: Laughing gas is -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., N2. OSpecial gaseso Sewer gas - H2S with CO2 and methane. o Marsh gas - Methaneo War gases: Tear gas - (i) Bromobenzylcyanide (BBC), (ii) Chloroacetophenone (CAP). Blister gas - Mustard gas and BAL (Lewisite) gas. Sickening gas - Diphinyl-amine-chlor-arsine. Laughing gas - N2O
